Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0ff9377afa68dc3ad3fe6844aaf1bd38/tumblr_inline_ngpbizcEHg1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>We’re celebrating our beta launch with a company holiday party. Celebrate with us by raising a glass and toasting to a successful 2014! Thanks for playing, participating and being the best community there is. We’ll see you in January!</p>

*Raises peice of toast*

Am I doing this correctly?

Alright!

*realizes one year closer to death*

Oh come on!
Congratulations Squad! You guys have earned it!

Congrats Squad, over the coming holiday I'll raise many many glasses to you all

..You're buying right?
Raisin Toast? okay....

I just finished to eat...

*raise a lot of glasses in his imagination*

It does count even in my imagination, right?

yay! if i was of legal age, i would!

don't worry, it will do something.
is this toast?
Enjoy and get plenty of rest.
Congrats on a great year! I've been playing KSP for a year, and I have enjoyed all aspects of KSP, from the forums to the learning and of course, the game itself!

Cheeeeeeeeers you guys!

Since 2012...

Through my lowest lows and highest highs,

you guy's have been there I've just realized.

My memory isn't what it used to be,

but now I compensate with rocketry!

And now you've thrown this update in my face

made me restart my whole space race

But for that I'll raise this toast instead

And hope your Kerbals are always well fed!

You really are the best!

Made this in about five minutes, will shade later

Thanks SQUAD!

*Raises Mighty Thor Mug*

I salute to you Squad for your extensive labor and commitment to this amazing game whose awesome multiplies exponentially with each release...

*Throws mug at Floor*

Now Another!...

But not today but soon.... SOON!

*walks over broken shards*

Ow!

Ow!

*Studies*

i must reclaim my study time!

Fitting song for y'all
Enjoy your break.
Thank you

Congratulations Squad. I am playing KSP for a year now and i am still enjoying visiting new places and develop new missions and craft. .90 was an awesome update, a major game changer to be honest. Building craft is now so much more fun and the new career options really make KSP a game now. So, thank your for an exciting year and for keeping the flag in the wind. Enjoy your holydays!

See you next year!
I've played tons of games,but KSP is the best of the best.
I've been playing KSP since 0.22 and it has been a awesome year playing the game. hears to a 2015 and what it will bring
Thanks for all the hard work on this great game! Cheers!
Thanks for producing a truly excellent game!

*Raises his coffee cup*

To the future! and all the Awesome stuff it will bring

We wish you a merry Christmas

- - - Updated - - -

I love the game

Congrats Squad, over the coming holiday I'll raise many many glasses to you all

..You're buying right?

Error: insuffiecient funds

*raises tea mug*

Eh, close enough?
I'm super hyped for the "toast raising" mechanic. Will Champagne have realistic fluid dynamics?
